data.title: Alien Poetry
data.statement: You receive a transmission from outer space, just 3 lines of text. The third line is an alien poem, and the first 2 lines contain instructions on how to format the poem. Your task is to separate this poem into lines and stanzas using the first 2 lines of text as the separators.

testCases.title: Example
testCases.testIn:
*
&
Roses are red*Violets are blue&Here's a new stanza*Just for you
testCases.testOut:
Roses are red
Violets are blue

Here's a new stanza
Just for you

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:
*
&
Roses are red*Violets are glue&Here's a new stanza*Just for you
testCases.testOut:
Roses are red
Violets are glue

Here's a new stanza
Just for you

pf pppf pfpp

testCases.title: Gabby
testCases.testIn:
diddlydoobada
*
gaba gababa gagaba gabididdlydoobadagaba gababa gagaba gaboodiddlydoobadadaba da daba da daba da digididdlydoobadadaba da daba da digiri doo
testCases.testOut:
gaba gababa gagaba gabi
gaba gababa gagaba gaboo
daba da daba da daba da digi
daba da daba da digiri doo

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
diddlydoobada
*
gaba gababa gagaba gabididdlydoobadagaba gababa gagaba gaboodiddlydoobadadaba da daba da daba da digididdlydoobadadaba da daba da digiri doodiddlydoobadadaba da daba da digiri boo
testCases.testOut:
gaba gababa gagaba gabi
gaba gababa gagaba gaboo
daba da daba da daba da digi
daba da daba da digiri doo
daba da daba da digiri boo

data.stubGenerator:
read ls:string(100)
read ss:string(100)
read p:string(1024)
write poem
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> A string [[ls]] the separator between lines of the poem
<<Line 2:>> A string [[ss]] the separator between stanzas of the poem
<<Line 3:>> A string [[p]] the poem
data.outputDescription: Output the poem separated into lines and stanzas (stanzas should have 1 blank row between them). See example below.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You receive a transmission from outer space, just 3 lines of text. The third line is an alien poem, and the first 2 lines contain instructions on how to format the poem. Your task is to separate this poem into lines and stanzas using the first 2 lines of text as the separators.
Input
Line 1: A string ls the separator between lines of the poem
Line 2: A string ss the separator between stanzas of the poem
Line 3: A string p the poem
Output
Output the poem separated into lines and stanzas (stanzas should have 1 blank row between them). See example below.
Constraints
Example
Input
*
&
Roses are red*Violets are blue&Here's a new stanza*Just for you
Output
Roses are red
Violets are blue

Here's a new stanza
Just for you
